name: Blue Circle Hydrated lime, 25kg Bag
description: Blue Circle Hydralime is a hydrated lime used for increased plasticity & cohesiveness in cement, mortars & rendersPreparation: 1 part Portland cement, 1 part hydralime & 5 to 6 parts sandFeatures and benefitsBlue Circle Hydralime is a hydrated lime used for increased plasticity & cohesiveness in cement, mortars & rendersFine, white, dry powder which lightens and brightens mortarsA high calcium, non hydraulic, hydrated limeMakes floating renders and pointing mortars easierHydralime can be used for traditional nominal mixes for mortars and renders in conjunction with standard Portland based cements or in lime-washes without cement

name: Blue Circle Hydralime Hydrated Lime (25kg)
description: Blue Circle Hydralime Hydrated Lime is used for increased plasticity and cohesiveness in cement, mortars and renders. Features & Benefits:   Fully conforms to the requirements set by BS EN 459-1. It is independently certified by a third party and also carries CE marking.  Must be mixed with sand and cement for mortars and renders.  Improves the water retention of Portland cement mortars and renders (not generally compatible with waterproofing admixtures or for use without Portland cement).  Easily mixed to form a putty.  Supplied in paper bags.  Size: 25kg

name: Breedon Hydrated Lime 25Kg
description: Breedon’s Hydrated Lime is a fine white calcium hydroxide powder to EN 459-1 CL-S which is made by the reaction of quicklime and water.Benefits:Excellent workability.Water retention.Application:Suitable for use in concrete, mortar, soil stabilisation, and render. Trial mixes are advised before commencement of work.

name: Hanson Hydrated Lime Paper Handy Bag 25kg
description: A handy 25kg bag of Hanson Hydrated Lime. A traditional lime that offers excellent workability and good water retention. It is not suitable for use in mortars and renders without Portland cement as it is a non-hydraulic product. Supplied in paper bag – store in a dry place.Features & benefitsConforms to BS EN 9001Traditional limeExcellent workability and good water retentionNot suitable for use in mortars and renders without Portland cementSupplied in paper bag – store in a dry place.

name: Bradfords 20mm Gravel Bulk Bag
description: 20mm gravel is suitable for general building and landscaping projects. Recyclable bulk bag.  800kg min packaged weight (+/-5%).  Size: 20mm

name: 20mm Pea Gravel/Shingle Bulk Bag
description: Our Pea Gravel/ Shingle contains stones between 15mm and 20mm in diameter. It is suitable for a variety of applications, both functional and decorative, but are generally used on driveways, borders and bedding drainage pipes. 20mm shingle is much easier spread across a large area and hide mounds, the larger particle size also means that it is less likely to get stuck in tyres or shoes, so is less likely to transfer to unwanted areas. Pea Shingle effectively prevents weeds growing through when placed around flowerbeds.Key Features:Bulk Bag15-20mm in variationIdeal for driveways, paths, borders and bedding drainage pipesSuitable for use in fine concreteActs as a weed suppressantThis is a natural product and colour may vary

name: Jewson Pea Gravel/Pipe Bedding Single Trip - Large Bulk Bag
description: Jewson Pea Gravel/Pipe Bedding Single Trip - Large Bulk Bag are small rounded stones that are each the size of a pea. The pea gravel prevents weeds and improves drainage. It is also easily maintained by raking the stones into place. This product is made with naturally occurring materials - colour and texture will differ due to the various locations it is sourced from. This should be considered if using this product for decorative purposes.Features & benefitsStops erosionCan be used as rodent barrier

name: Blue Circle Quality Assured Ready to Use Mortar 20kg

This motor comes in a convenient weatherproof plastic bag and is suitable for interior and exterior use.Quality assured for a consistent mix and colour finishLong board lifeEnhanced freeze/thaw resistance resulting in longer lasting mortarReduced spalling and cracking6 month shelf-lifeConforms to BES 6001 for responsible sourcingView more

name: Blue Circle Mastercrete Cement, 25kg Bag
description: Mastercrete is n enhanced Portland-limestone cement, for general purpose work, with improved resistance to freeze/thaw attack, lower water demand than ordinary Portland cement and offers a more cohesive mix.See Blue Circle Cement UK Health and Safety sheetsFeatures and benefitsContains cement quality improver to provide added benefits in comparison to ordinary Portland cement: lower water demand, more cohesive mix, less tendency for water to segregate and bleed and enhanced resistance of hardened concrete or mortar to freeze/thaw attackMastercrete is a cement based material and should be handled and stored with care. This product may be stored, unopened in either indoor or outdoor conditions

name: Blue Circle Mastercrete Cement 25kg Plastic Bag
description: Blue Circle Mastercrete Cement is a superior Portland-limestone general purpose cement that contains a number of additives to increase the performance, creating a superior product. Mastercrete entrains a controlled quality of air and the addition of admixture of the air-entraining type is unnecessary and not recommended for concrete.In mortar and rendering, the addition of proprietary air-entraining mortar plasticiser is either unnecessary or the manufacturer’s recommended dosage significantly reduced dependant upon the sand used.Other proprietary admixtures of the non air-entraining type and pigments are compatible with Mastercrete. Trial mixes are recommended to determine optimum mix proportions. Features & Benefits:   Multi-application - Ideal for use in use in concrete, bricklaying, floor screed & render.  Improved resistance to freeze/thaw attack - Compared to traditional cement.  Improved workability - Its cohesive mix is less likely to segregate and offers an improved trowel feel.  Reduced water demand - In concrete mortar and screeds for a more durable end product.  The original weatherproof packaging - Supplied in recyclable hard wearing, tear-proof packaging that was designed for external storage prior to use.

name: Tarmac Blue Circle Mastercrete Cement - 25kg
description: You can rely on Blue Circle Mastercrete. This superior general-purpose cement has improved workability for better mixes that are less likely to segregate. It also offers an improved trowel feel. It's multi-purpose, so it can be used for concrete, bricklaying, floor screeds and render. It has improved resistance to a freeze or thaw attack compared to traditional cement. Mastercrete has a lower water demand in concrete mortar and screeds, so it produces a more cohesive mix. It's supplied in hard-wearing, tear-proof and waterproof packaging, so there's no issue with leaving it out in the rain.

name: Blue Circle Mastercrete Cement - 25kg
description:
Mastercrete is the UK's bestselling cement , its multi-purpose ability makes it perfect for Concrete, Render, Bricklaying and Floor Screeds. Mastercrete has improved resistance to the cracks caused by freeze/thaw attack when compared to traditional cement. It produces a superior smoother and more consistent mix. And its weatherproof packaging means it's no problem to leave them outside in the rain.Multi-purpose cement offering a more workable mix and superior performance compared to ordinary cement Enhanced resistance to freeze/thaw attack reducing  cracking in your concrete Weatherproof plastic packaging allows cement to be stored outside in all weather saving waste and indoor storage space Shelf-life of up to six months allowing re-use in multiple jobs Consistent Strength meeting all the conformity criteria in BS EN 197-1 Mastercrete is a quality assured cement with independent third party certification and carries a CE mark Masterctrete's weatherproof packaging is 30% more environmentally beneficial than paper packed cement due to less material wastage Recycleable packaging Skin contact with wet cement, fresh concrete or mortar may cause irritation, dermatitis or burns 
		COSHH Sheet 1 - Blue Circle Mastercrete Cement - 25kg

name: Blue Circle Multipurpose Grey Mortar - 25kg
description: Blue Circle's multipurpose mortar is a quick and easy to use sand and cement mortar suitable for a wide range of masonry building applications. The factory produced formulation produces a professional quality dry mix mortar. The specially formulated multipurpose mortar provides superior workability, excellent bonding and long-lasting durability, whatever the application. It’s simple to mix and easy to use.It can be used for bricklaying, rendering and patching, repointing bricks, grouting bolts, block paving, slab fixing, repairing drains, pointing, rendering and setting posts. Grey colour when dried Blend of ordinary and specialist cements, high quality graded aggregate and a unique combination of polymers and admixtures. Suitable for all weather conditions Strong durable finish
